text: Edward 'Eddie B' Borysewicz (March 18, 1939 â€“ November 17, 2020) was a Polish- American Olympic cycling coach. He coached the American team that won nine medals at the Olympic Games in Los Angeles in 1984.US Bicycling Hall of Fame - 1996 Inductees - Eddie B' Borysewicz In 1996, he was honored into the United States Bicycling Hall of Fame. Borysewicz died of COVID-19 in Drezdenko, Poland on November 17, 2020 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Polish cyclists Category:American cyclists Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Eddie Borysewicz
